segments.text: I think this kitchen looks so ordinary at first glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight from the window makes everything bright and cheery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I spot the sink overflowing with water cascading down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is drying dishes, completely oblivious to the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in the puddle, and it could make her slip badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over on the side, a boy's perched on an unsteady stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching to get into the cookie jar, looking thrilled.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's right there, waiting with her hand out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They must be so excited about their little secret adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that stool is tilting back, it's dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's pooling everywhere, ruining the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside is calm, unaware of the trouble inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around before something bad happens.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids' mischief could end in tears.
segments.speaker: PAR
